metadata.title: CVE-2021-23562 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: This affects the package plupload before 2.3.9. A file name containingJavaScript code could be uploaded and run. An attacker would need to tricka user to upload this kind of file.

criterions.comment: plupload.js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
